intro.title: Scholarship Application
intro.description: Thank you for your interest in our scholarship program. This form will guide you through the application process. Please complete all required fields and submit any necessary documentation.

full_name.title: Full Name
full_name.description: Please enter your full legal name

address.title: Mailing Address
address.description: Please enter your complete mailing address
address.placeholder: Street address, City, State, Zip Code, Country

date_of_birth.title: Date of Birth
date_of_birth.description: Please enter your date of birth

current_school.title: Current School/Institution
current_school.description: Please enter the name of your current school or institution

education_level.title: Current Education Level
education_level.description: Please select your current education level

field_of_study.title: Field of Study
field_of_study.description: Please enter your major or field of study

gpa.title: Current GPA
gpa.description: Please enter your current GPA (on a 4.0 scale)

expected_graduation.title: Expected Graduation Date
expected_graduation.description: Please enter your expected graduation date

academic_achievements.title: Academic Achievements
academic_achievements.description: Please list any academic achievements, honors, or awards

extracurricular_activities.title: Extracurricular Activities
extracurricular_activities.description: Please list any extracurricular activities, leadership roles, or community service

financial_need.title: Financial Need Statement
financial_need.description: Please explain your financial need for this scholarship

household_income.title: Annual Household Income
household_income.description: Please select your annual household income range

dependents.title: Number of Dependents in Household
dependents.description: Please select the number of dependents in your household (including yourself)

other_scholarships.title: Other Scholarships
other_scholarships.description: Please list any other scholarships or financial aid you have applied for or received

employment_status.title: Employment Status
employment_status.description: Please select your current employment status

personal_statement.title: Personal Statement
personal_statement.description: Please write a personal statement explaining why you deserve this scholarship (500-1000 words)

career_goals.title: Career Goals
career_goals.description: Please describe your career goals and how this scholarship will help you achieve them (250-500 words)

challenges_overcome.title: Challenges Overcome
challenges_overcome.description: Please describe any significant challenges or obstacles you have overcome (optional)

transcript.title: Academic Transcript
transcript.description: Please upload your most recent academic transcript (PDF format preferred)

recommendation_letter.title: Letter of Recommendation
recommendation_letter.description: Please upload a letter of recommendation from a teacher, professor, or employer (PDF format preferred)

financial_documents.title: Financial Documents
financial_documents.description: Please upload any relevant financial documents to support your application (e.g., FAFSA, tax returns)

additional_documents.title: Additional Supporting Documents
additional_documents.description: Please upload any additional documents that may support your application

how_discovered.title: How did you hear about this scholarship?
how_discovered.description: Please select how you heard about this scholarship opportunity

additional_info.title: Additional Information
additional_info.description: Is there anything else you would like us to know about you or your application?

certification.title: Information Certification
certification.description: I certify that all information provided in this application is true and complete to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false information or omission may disqualify me from further consideration for the scholarship.

permission.title: Information Usage Permission
permission.description: I give permission to the scholarship committee to verify the information provided in this application and to contact my references.

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: Your scholarship application has been submitted. You will receive a confirmation email shortly. The scholarship committee will review your application and notify you of their decision within 4-6 weeks.
